name: Block Slide (Laizer)
description:
Welcome to Block Slide!

Block slide is about a block that is trying to make it past all the levels to reach the end, but the journey won't be easy, as there is a lot of obstacles that will stop in the block's way.

Reach the end and don't let the obstacles stop you!

*NOTE:  THE GAME IS STILL IN EARLY ACCESS, SO THERE MIGHT BE A LOT OF BUGS / WE ARE ACTIVELY  WORKING  ON IT * 

Contact:

Make sure to contact us if you have any questions or want to report about a bug. Email: developmentslzr@gmail.comDownload Instructions:

1. Download the file. 

 2. Double click it when it finishes downloading, and then follow the steps. 

 3. Enjoy the game!
